name: Viking Weapon Specialist
summary: You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people.
description:
You are even more skilled in the weapons of your people. You gain the critical specialization effects of the battle axe, hatchet, longsword, and shortsword. Whenever you gain a class feature that grants you expert or greater proficiency in certain weapons, you also gain that proficiency rank in the above four weapons.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
